scripts.start: yarn build && yarn workspace website build && pm2 startOrRestart ecosystem.config.js --env production
scripts.dev: yarn build && pm2 startOrRestart ecosystem.config.js --env development --watch
scripts.dev:website: yarn build && pm2 startOrRestart ecosystem.config.js --env development --only website --watch
scripts.dev:server: yarn build && pm2 startOrRestart ecosystem.config.js --env development --only server --watch
scripts.dev:restart: yarn build && pm2 restart ecosystem.config.js --env development --watch
